sentences.sentence: We ought to use the pluperfect and say wakened, but woke is better and was always used by Peter.
sentences.translation: 我们应该用过去完成时说“已经醒来”，但是“醒过来”更好，彼得总是说“醒过来”。

sentences.sentence: I would argue that it was pluperfect obviously disabled the banks and the major investment banks.
sentences.translation: 我认为很明显对银行和主要投资银行,产生了阻碍作用。
